thread.title: Uber Drivers Forum Surpasses 500 Members and 5,000 Posts
thread.title_full: Uber Drivers Forum Surpasses 500 Members and 5,000 Posts - CBS News 8 - San Diego, CA News Station - KFMB Channel 8

author: cbs8
title: Uber Drivers Forum Surpasses 500 Members and 5,000 Posts
text:
Uber Forum
Uber Forum is pleased to announce significant momentum reaching over 500 members and 5,000 posts. Uber Forum launched in 2015 to help rideshare drivers and riders learn about their options with Uber, Lyft, Sidecar and more.
SAN FRANCISCO , Oct. 26, Uber Forum is a transportation network company ("TNC") rideshare community and resource. Uber Forum was created by rideshare drivers and riders in 2015 in order to be a resource and share insights about TNC companies such as Uber, Lyft, Sidecar and more. Uber Forum is an independent and unbiased resource not affiliated with any TNC and has a diverse member base including Uber drivers, Uber riders, Lyft drivers, Lyft riders, rideshare authors and prominent journalists writing about the rideshare economy.
Uber Forum launched in 2015 to be a leading resource for Uber, Lyft, Sidecar and other rideshare companies. The Uber Forum website has grown unique visitors by over 30% month over month since the Uber Forum launch and has helped thousands of people including TNC drivers and riders learn about companies such as Uber, Lyft, Sidecar and more.
Today marks a significant milestone of reaching 500 members. The month of September was a record month in terms of unique visitors which tallied nearly 20k for the month. October is on pace to significantly exceed September's traffic.
Uber Forum thanks its valued members and visitors for making the Uber Forum website a leading TNC community and rideshare resource on Uber, Lyft, Sidecar and more.
Uber Forum has hundreds of individual city forums as well as: Uber Drivers Forum, Uber Riders Forum, Lyft Drivers Forum, Lyft Riders Forum, Sidecar Forum, Rideshare Forum, Postmates Forum, Instacart Forum, TNC News Forum, and a For Sale / Wanted / Trades / Promotions / Deals Forum.
It is free to become a member and enjoy the full benefits of the Uber Forum. It only takes a minute to register. If you are interested in becoming an Uber Forum member please register here today.
